reviewText: As someone that followed these two during this time period, this movie brings back a lot of good memories!!!, Always loved how Jungle Pam use to back Jungle Jim! the sight was pure haven!!
I thought it was a GREAT movie!! I love the family racing, the history of racing, and the business of racing!!

This is a great movie. The subject will actually probably limit it's audience for decades. The stories told are real,diverse and 3 dimensional and for the amount of time needed to tell them, the limits of screen time, were well exercised.

As a drag racing fan, it is probably the best piece of cinema ever devoted to any part of the subject, as is 'Heart Like a Wheel'

The acting was never questionable and the screenplay was streamlined and able to deliver 40 years of racing history, two careers in depth and two completely different social lives in one pleasant sitting.

Great film, make sure to remind your non racing friend about the advances to everyone's vehicles due to guys like these.

Great film, period correct, no glaring Hollywood errors.
Love the NHRA, two legends and there great story....If you love racing, you will love this movie....Wish they would fire the sound guy, nitro cars don't sound like Prostockers....
fun video
shirt was rather small but the video was awesome if you like a good story with early drag racing footage.
Great movie about two icons of the racing world.
Great Movie for Drag Racers

My husband is a 'car guy', and we both remember the racing careers of these guys.  Don 'the Snake' Prudhomme, lived in our hometown, Granada Hills, CA.  My husband has stacks of hotrod magazines, photos and articles about all the greats of the time, including Mickey Thompson, Tommy Ivo, etc.  This movie told is like it was...back in the day!
